text: Vamsam is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Baiju Kottarakkara, starring Mukesh and Sukumaran in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Mukesh as Kurushinkal Jimmy * Sreejaya Nair as Meenu/Meenakshi * Sukumaran as Kurishinkal Vakkachan * Saikumar as Kurishinkal Vavachan * Ratheesh as S. P. Xavichan Fernandez * Janardhanan as Palakkunnel Manuel * Bheeman Raghu as Kurishinkal Koshi * Cochin Haneefa as Thampan * Sankaradi as Father Illikkadan * Philomina as Kurishinkal Rahael * Sathyapriya as Kochumol/Kochammini * Baburaj as S. I. Scaria * Baiju Ezhupunna as Sunnychan * Sathaar as Ummachan * Bobby Kottarakkara as Kidilan Thampi * Haritha as Monica Zen * Kundara Johnny as Palakkunnel Thommichan * Sonia Baiju Kottarakkara as Sophia * T. S. Raju as Palakkunnel Paulachan * Usha as Alice *Tony as Ashokan *Anil Murali as Jimmy's friend *Keerthi Gopinath as Annie *Spadikam George as Mundakkayam Markose *Thodupuzha Vasanthy as Kunjannamma *Swapna Ravi as Marykutty *Baby Neeraja as Ponnu *Kaduvakulam Antony as Sharadamma's Husband *K. R. Valsala as MLA Sharadamma Mathew *C. I. Paul as Minister K. M. Chacko *Rizabawa as Shantha Ram *Prathapachandran as Sreedharan mashu *Ponnamma Babu as Thommichan's wife == Soundtrack == The music was composed by S. P. Venkatesh and the lyrics were written by Bichu Thirumala. {| class="wikitable" !No. !Song !Singers !Lyrics !Length |- |1 |"Pandukaalam" |Mano |Bichu Thirumala | |- |2 |"Manjalamoodum" |K. S.
